data.description: dispatch methd call to all inherited methods
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Other than with NEXT, you do not have to alter your methods for the
    dispatching to work.

    While mutliple inheritance et.al. might be quite confusing , IMO
    there are uses for it (see
    http://www.perlmonks.org/index.pl?node_id=180852 for further
    discussion)
